Overview
Holy Warriors uses recreations and interviews with historians in order to tell the story of how Richard the Lion Hearted and Saladin each attempted to secure the holy city of Jerusalem for their respective religions. The story details how this confrontation provides the seed of much of the struggle between religions that would continue over the next few centuries.
